item.description:
November's meetup will be with the Entrepreneurs of Color Helping Others (ECHO) group.

ECHO is a powerful learning and networking event for entrepreneurs of color. Hear experts in a wide variety of fields share advice to take you and your enterprise to the next level. Our November speaker will be Natasha Saunders, CEO/Founder of The Youth Career Coach Incorporated.

Free admission with RSVP so register today.

The mission of ECHO is to support the entrepreneurial community with impactful, innovative programs that foster growth, stimulate ideas, and build unity.

If you would like to sponsor a meeting or provide giveaways, contact info -at- bostonoffline.com

Please use hashtag #echone when tweeting about this event.

*Please note area parking is limited. The venue is near the Mass Ave. T stop.

***As the holiday season is approaching, if you are a retail vendor then bring in samples of your product for showcase***
item.name: Entrepreneurs of Color Helping Others (ECHO) Monthly Meeting
